short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You see, I take this Chrome extension off, Google looks like a regular company, doesn't it? Put 'em back on... formaldehyde-face!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This "item" is an extension that alters the DOM of some Google-owned sites. When browsed to, a message will pop up stating that your privacy is owned by Google, and a few Google-specific words have been changed around all for good fun. This is my very first attempt at creating an extension and decided it was going to poke fun at how much I dislike the company and all of it's worthless, outdated, mediocre products that have slowly seeped their slimy way into my everyday life. 

"You see, I take this Chrome extension off, Google looks like a regular company, doesn't it? Put 'em back on... formaldehyde-face!"
